member.summary: An object containing data saved to and loaded from cards.

member.summary: Version of the plugin data saved to the card. Get or set this if ever your plugin data format changes and use it to differentiate.

member.summary: Dictionary of objects saved to or loaded loaded from the card.

member.name: T:BepisPlugins.ResourceUtils
member.summary: Utility methods for working with embedded resources.

member.name: M:BepisPlugins.ResourceUtils.ReadAllBytes(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Read all bytes starting at current position and ending at the end of the stream.

member.name: M:BepisPlugins.ResourceUtils.GetEmbeddedResource(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Get a file set as "Embedded Resource" from the assembly that is calling this code, or optionally from a specified assembly. The filename is matched to the end of the resource path, no need to give the full path. If 0 or more than 1 resources match the provided filename, an exception is thrown. For example if you have a file "ProjectRoot\Resources\icon.png" set as "Embedded Resource", you can use this to load it by doing GetEmbeddedResource("icon.png"), assuming that no other embedded files have the same name.

member.name: M:Extensions.Replace(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison)
member.summary: Returns a new string in which all occurrences of a specified string in the current instance are replaced with another specified string according the type of search to use for the specified string. Stolen from https://stackoverflow.com/a/45756981
member.param: The string performing the replace method.
The string to be replaced.
The string replace all occurrences of . If value is equal to null, than all occurrences of will be removed from the .
One of the enumeration values that specifies the rules for the search.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the current string except that all instances of are replaced with . If is not found in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

member.name: M:Extensions.FindPosition(System.IO.Stream,System.Byte[])
member.summary: Find first position of the byte sequence in the stream starting at current position. Returns position of first byte of the sequence. https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1550560/encoding-an-integer-in-7-bit-format-of-c-sharp-binaryreader-readstring
